## Getting Started

First, run the development server:

```bash
npm run dev
```

Open [http://localhost:3000](http://localhost:3000) with your browser to see the result.

## Package

- ・next : 12.0.7
- ・tailwindcss : 3.0.8
- ・framer-motion : 5.6.0
- ・nodemailer : 6.7.2
- ・react-circular-progress-bar : 1.1.1
